title: Settings
init: $('body').addClass('textured');$('#subheader').text(OF.page.title);$('#subheader').remove();OF.page.enableSubscribe=function(enabled){var button=$('#subscribe');if(enabled){button.children('span').addClass('subscribed');}else{button.children('span').removeClass('subscribed');}};OF.api.request('/xp/news_letter_subscription',{success:function(data){OF.page.enableSubscribe(data.news_letter_subscription.is_subscribed);}});$('#subscribe').touch(function(){if(!$('#subscribe').data('isLoading')){$('#subscribe').data('isLoading',true);var button=$('#subscribe');var isSubscribed=button.children('span').hasClass('subscribed');OF.page.enableSubscribe(!isSubscribed);OF.api.request('/xp/news_letter_subscription',{method:isSubscribed?'DELETE':'POST',success:$.noop,complete:function(){$('#subscribe').data('isLoading',false)}});}});$("#secure").touch(function(){setTimeout(function(){OF.push('settings/secure');},300);});$("#password").touch(function(){setTimeout(function(){OF.push('settings/password');},300);});$("#email").touch(function(){setTimeout(function(){OF.push('settings/email');},300);});$('#logout').touch(function(){if(confirm('Are you sure you want to logout from Feint?')){OF.sendAction('logout');}});
